code: import Bill from'../pages/Bill';import Login from'../pages/Login';import Error404 from'../components/Error404';import HeaderOnly from'../components/Layout/HeaderOnly';var publicRoutes=[];if(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user'))!=="0"){publicRoutes=[{path:'/bill',component:Bill,layout:HeaderOnly},{path:'/login',component:Login,layout:null},{path:'*',component:Error404,layout:null}];}else{publicRoutes=[{path:'/login',component:Login,layout:null},{path:'*',component:Error404,layout:null}];}var privateRoutes=[];export{publicRoutes,privateRoutes};
